sourcesContent:
import React from "react";
import {Box, Typography, styled, Button, Stack} from "@mui/material"
import Background from "./../Images/HeroBackground.jpg";
import Handy from "./../Images/handy.png";

const RightBox = styled(Box)({
    background: `linear-gradient(to left, rgba(20, 20, 20,0), rgba(20,20,20,1)),url(${Background})`,
    backgroundSize: "100%",
    backgroundRepeat: "no-repeat",
    height: "80vh",
});

const Header = styled(Stack)({
    background: "#BFD200",
    textAlign: "left",
    textOverflow: "ellipsis",
    alignItems: "center",
    gap: "2px",
});

const StyledButton = styled(Button)({
    background: "#BFD200",
    color: "black",
    borderRadius: "15%",
});

const WhiteText = styled(Typography)({
    color: "white",
});

const GreenText = styled(Typography)({
    color: "#BFD200",
});

//StyledBox als Parent von LeftBox und RIghtBox?
export default function Hero() {
    return (
        <Stack direction="row" bgcolor="rgba(20, 20, 20,1)">
            <Stack flex={1}
                component="img"
                src={require("../Images/handy.png")}
                sx={{height:"80vh"}}>
            </Stack>
            <Stack direction="column" flex={2}>
                <Header direction="row">
                    <Typography variant="h4">
                        DEIN DIGITALER 
                    </Typography>
                    <Typography variant="h4" sx={{fontWeight:"bold", p:"5px"}}>
                        CO-TRAINER
                    </Typography>
                </Header>
                <RightBox>
                    <Box sx={{  margin: "10%", 
                                display: "flex",
                                flexDirection: "column",
                                alignItems: "space-between",}}>
                        <Box sx={{  display:"flex", 
                                    flexDirection:"column",
                                    alignItems:"flex-end"}}>
                            <GreenText>
                                COACHING MADE EASY
                            </GreenText>
                            <WhiteText fontSize="2.5rem">
                                MINIMALER AUFWAND.
                            </WhiteText>
                            <WhiteText fontSize="2.5rem" sx={{fontWeight:"bold"}}>
                                MAXIMALER ERFOLG.
                            </WhiteText>
                            <WhiteText>
                                Weil der Trainerjob Spa√ü machen soll!
                            </WhiteText>
                            <StyledButton>
                                LOS GEHT'S
                            </StyledButton>
                        </Box>
                        <Stack direction="row" sx={{display:"flex", 
                                                    flexDirection:"row",
                                                    justifyContent:"space-between", 
                                                    position: "sticky", bottom: "0"}}>
                            <Stack direction="column">
                                <WhiteText sx={{fontWeight: "bold", fontSize: "20px"}}>
                                    6.000+
                                </WhiteText>
                                <WhiteText>
                                    Trainer
                                </WhiteText>
                            </Stack>
                            <Stack direction="column">
                                <WhiteText  sx={{fontWeight: "bold", fontSize: "20px"}}>
                                    5 Mio
                                </WhiteText>
                                <WhiteText>
                                    Trainings
                                </WhiteText>
                            </Stack>
                            <Stack direction="column">
                                <WhiteText  sx={{fontWeight: "bold", fontSize: "20px"}}>
                                    3.000+
                                </WhiteText>
                                <WhiteText>
                                    Spiele
                                </WhiteText>
                            </Stack>
                        </Stack>
                    </Box>
                </RightBox>
            </Stack>
        </Stack>
    )
}
